conditions.name: Compare length
conditions.description: Compare the length of the buffer in bytes.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the length.

params.name: Length
params.description: Length to compare in bytes.

conditions.name: Compare value
conditions.description: Compare the value at an offset in the buffer.

params.name: Value type
params.description: Value type to read.

params.name: Offset
params.description: Offset of the value in bytes.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the value.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to compare.

conditions.name: On compression failed
conditions.description: Triggered when compression fails to complete.

conditions.name: On decompression failed
conditions.description: Triggered when decompression fails to complete.

actions.name: Set endian
actions.description: Set endian used for reading and writing values.

params.name: Endian
params.description: New endian to use.

params.name: Length
params.description: New length for buffer in bytes.

actions.name: Set from Binary Data
actions.description: Set buffer to a copy of another Binary Data object.

params.name: Source
params.description: Content to copy buffer from.

actions.name: Fill
actions.description: Fill the specified range with the given value.

params.name: Value type
params.description: Value type to insert.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to insert.

params.name: Offset
params.description: Offset of start in bytes.

params.name: Length
params.description: Length of area to fill in bytes. Use -1 for end.

actions.name: Copy
actions.description: Copy a range of data from a Binary Data object to a specific location in this buffer.

params.name: Source
params.description: Binary Data object to copy data from

params.name: Start
params.description: Start of range in bytes (inclusive).

params.name: Length
params.description: Length of range in bytes. Use -1 for end.

params.name: Target
params.description: Location to insert range in bytes.

actions.name: Set value
actions.description: Set a value within the buffer.

params.name: Value type
params.description: Value type to insert.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to set.

params.name: Offset
params.description: Offset of value in bytes.

actions.name: Compress
actions.description: Compress the stored data with a compression algorithm to try to reduce its data size.

params.name: Format
params.description: The compression format to use.

actions.name: Decompress
actions.description: Decompress some existing compressed data to return the original data.

params.name: Format
params.description: The compression format to use.

actions.name: Set from string
actions.description: Set the buffer from a string of text (UTF-8), base64, or hexadecimal.

params.name: String
params.description: The string to set.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to set the string as text (with UTF-8 encoding), base64, or hexadecimal.

expressions.name: GetURL
expressions.description: Get a blob URL for the current data.

expressions.name: GetBase64
expressions.description: Get the current buffer encoded as a base64 string.

expressions.name: ByteLength
expressions.description: Get the length of the current buffer in bytes.

expressions.name: GetInt8
expressions.description: Get an Int8 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetUint8
expressions.description: Get a Uint8 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetInt16
expressions.description: Get an Int16 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetUint16
expressions.description: Get a Uint16 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetInt32
expressions.description: Get an Int32 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetUint32
expressions.description: Get a Uint32 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetFloat32
expressions.description: Get a Float32 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetFloat64
expressions.description: Get a Float64 value at a byte offset.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

expressions.name: GetText
expressions.description: Get UTF-8 text from a given range.

params.name: ByteOffset
params.description: Position to read the value from, in bytes from the start.

params.name: Length
params.description: Length of the text to read, in bytes.

expressions.name: GetAllText
expressions.description: Get the entire buffer as UTF-8 encoded text.

expressions.name: GetHex
expressions.description: Get the current buffer encoded as a hexadecimal string.
